synopsis.text: Prince Siegfried's life is changed forever when he encounters a mysterious swan wearing a crown while out hunting one day. He follows the swan to a lake, where he witnesses it transform into Princess Odette as the sun sets. Siegfried learns that Odette has been cursed by the evil wizard Rothbart to turn into a swan during the day. Rothbart desires to keep Odette for himself and only true love can break the spell. As Siegfried and Odette spend time together, they begin to fall in love. However, Rothbart has no intention of letting Odette go. He devises schemes to come between the two and prevent their love from growing. Siegfried faces an uphill battle if he wishes to save Odette by declaring his unconditional love for her. Though the path ahead is filled with obstacles, Siegfried bravely fights on, determined to free Odette from her cruel fate.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
